content: Is it possible when creating a new Lean project (lake +leanprover/lean4:nightly-2024-04-24 new my_project math) to automatically add a library configuration option to the generated lakefile.lean file such as globs := #[.andSubmodules `MyProject] and to add a dependency on an external github repository?
Is there also a way to prevent the automatic conversion of the name to camel case?

I'm pretty sure the answer right now is "no" -- https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/issues/5453 I think is a relevant issue you might thumbs up (presumably adding this functionality would happen both post-creation and during creation of a new project).
Do supporting programs require that the name be camel case, or is it just a convention?
